title: Best of The Program | Guests: Rep. Chris Stewart & Jerry Falwell Jr. | 5/15/20
description:
Are Washington state’s newest coronavirus rules straight out of Nazi Germany or the book of Revelation? California is creating a plan to house the homeless. Rep. Chris Stewart joins to discuss what he knew three years ago: There was ZERO evidence against Gen. Flynn! Here’s how we know the unmasking was suspicious. The number of people who support a police state is staggering! Liberty University president Jerry Falwell Jr. is suing the New York Times for misrepresenting his school’s reopening when in reality, there were NO new cases of coronavirus.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
